DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine diagnostic quality contrast-enhanced coronary magnetic resonance angiography ( MRA ) improve use high versus lower dose gadolinium-based contrast agent . We compare two dos intravascular contrast agent ( Gadofosveset , 0.03 0.06 mmol/kg ) pilot dose study . Healthy participant recruit clinical indication MR angiography safety clearance IV gadolinium contrast MR scanning . Subjects evaluate order determine signal noise ratio ( SNR ) contrast noise ratio ( CNR ) coronary artery increase high dose contrast agent . Parameters compare pair t-testing significance .
